changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('FFF_STAGING.WORKFLOW_REFRESH', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE FFF_STAGING.WORKFLOW_REFRESH ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_WORKFLOW_REFRESH_ID DEFAULT NEWID(), CSV_TYPE NVARCHAR(1) INDEX IX_WORKFLOW_REFRESH_CSV_TYPE, REFRESH_TIME DATETIMEOFFSET NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_WORKFLOW_REFRESH_REFRESH_TIME DEFAULT GETUTCDATE() CONSTRAINT PK_WORKFLOW_REFRESH PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([ID]), CONSTRAINT CHK_WORKFLOW_REFRESH_CSV_TYPE CHECK (CSV_TYPE IN ('C', 'F', 'N', 'U')) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('FFF_STAGING.WORKFLOW_REFRESH', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE FFF_STAGING.WORKFLOW_REFRESH
